name: Cross Stitch Club
description:
Cross stitch the most brilliant author’s patterns ever and earn nice souvenirs. I wonder — how many of you them you can get!

Share your embroideries with family and friends - let them admire!

Forget of stress and anxiety. Say hi to a cup of tea and cozy sofa. Welcome to the Cross Stitch Club.

Features:
— Simple and fun process of cross stitching by number!
— Tons of beautiful patterns.
— Get nice rewards for your needlecraft!
— Share your works with your friends!
